Character

This is a Unicode character map. It supports all of the codepoints and planes that are currently available as of Unicode (version).

In addition to details about encodings, blocks, ages, and categories, the names of characters are augmented by definitions from the Unihan database, where appropriate.

Source is available under the ISC licence.

Keyboard shortcuts

Home: go to first visible character
Home Home: go to U+0000
End: go to last visible character
End End: go to U+10FFFF
Page Up: show the previous page
Page Down: show the next page
Arrow keys: navigate the character map

Credits

Unicode Character Database: Unicode Consortium
Symbola font: George Douros
Twemoji font: Brad Erickson and others
lzo1x library: Alistair Braidwood

Browser compatibility

Chrome 23: perfect
Firefox 17: perfect
IE 10: perfect
Opera 12: some UI problems
Safari 5: only BMP characters
